TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader extends System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader

summary.span: 類別，這個類別會包裝指定的讀取器，並將所有的 呼叫委派給包裝的讀取器。

span.span: A class that wraps a specified reader and delegates all calls to the wrapped reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包裝的讀取器可以透過存取屬性。The reader that is wrapped can be accessed through the property. 呼叫方法以設定已包裝的讀取器，並初始化屬性。Call the method to set the wrapped reader and initialize the property.
